config.description: Z1 Down - 直连NOMA+协作 - downlink

tor_circuit_mapping.description: 3-hop Tor circuit mapped to SAGIN nodes

tc_commands: sudo tc qdisc del dev lo root 2>/dev/null || true
sudo tc qdisc add dev lo root netem delay 2.71ms 0.68ms distribution normal rate 192.18mbit loss 3.00%

test_runs.stdout:

============================================

[Client] Connected to Guard
